flavor: "여러분의 친절한 이웃, Spider-Man입니다!"
name: Spider-Man
text: 스파이더센스 — 간섭: 빌런이 당신에게 공격을 개시할 때, 카드 1장을 뽑습니다.

flavor: "지금은 일상으로 돌아가 흔들의자에 앉아 좋은 책을 읽어야겠어."
name: Peter Parker
text: 과학자 — 자원: [mental] 자원을 생성합니다 (라운드마다 1회 제한).

flavor: "난 도둑이지 히어로가 아니야."
name: Black Cat
text: 강제 반응: 당신이 Black Cat을 플레이한 후, 당신의 덱 맨 위에서 카드 2장을 버립니다. 이렇게 버려진 카드 중 [mental] 자원이 인쇄된 카드를 모두 당신의 손에 더합니다.

flavor: "연습 좀 했나봐? 거의 맞을 뻔 했거든." -- Spider-Man
name: 공중제비
text: 난입 (방어): 당신이 공격으로 피해를 입으려 할 때, 그 피해를 모두 방지합니다.

flavor: "내 스파이더센스가 찌릿했어." -- Spider-Man
name: 향상된 스파이더센스
text: 히어로 난입: 조우 덱에서 배반 카드가 공개될 때, 그 카드의 "공개될 때" 효과를 모두 무효화합니다.

flavor: "명중!" -- Spider-Man
name: 거미줄 날아차기
text: 히어로 행동 (공격): 적 하나에게 피해 8점을 입힙니다.

flavor: "세상에나, Peter! 요즘 너무 자주 다치는구나."
name: Aunt May
text: 일상 행동: Aunt May를 소진 → Peter Parker가 입은 피해 4점을 치료.

name: 스파이더 추적기
text: 하수인에게 장착합니다. 강제 난입: 장착된 하수인이 격파될 때, 음모 하나에서 위협을 3만큼 제거합니다.

name: 웹슈터
text: 사용 (3 웹 카운터). (카운터를 3만큼 놓은 채로 플레이 영역에 들어옵니다. 카운터가 모두 사라지면 이 카드를 버립니다.) 히어로 자원: 웹슈터를 소진하고 이 카드에서 웹 카운터를 1만큼 제거 → [wild] 자원을 생성.

flavor: "I never quit."
name: Captain Marvel
text: Rechannel — Action: Spend a [energy] resource and heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "It's my job to protect the Earth and everyone on it."
name: Carol Danvers
text: Commander — Action: Choose a player to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "This is what I wanted: helping the innocents by hospitalizing the guilty."
name: Spider-Woman
text: Response: After Spider-Woman enters play, confuse the villain.

flavor: "This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen." -- Carol Danvers
name: Crisis Interdiction
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Then, if you have the [[Aerial]] trait, remove 2 threat from a different scheme.

name: Photonic Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, draw 1 card.

flavor: "That's enough!" -- Carol Danvers
name: Energy Absorption

flavor: This low-orbit space station can beam cargo and crew to and from the Triskelion
name: Alpha Flight Station
text: Action: Exhaust Alpha Flight Station, choose and discard 1 card from your hand → draw 1 card (draw 2 cards instead if you are Carol Danvers).

flavor: "This is so cool!" -- Jessica Drew
name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
text: Captain Marvel gets +1 DEF (+2 DEF instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).

name: Cosmic Flight
text: Captain Marvel gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt (defense): When Captain Marvel would take damage, discard Cosmic Flight → prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Energy Channel
text: Max 1 per player. Action: Spend X [energy] resources → put X energy counters here. Hero Action (attack): Discard Energy Channel → deal 2 damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 10) for each energy counter here.

flavor: "I'm six foot seven and bright green! People are gonna stare no matter how I dress."
name: She-Hulk
text: "Do You Even Lift?" — Response: After you change to this form, deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I can turn into a Hulk anytime I want. But just because you can do something doesn't always mean you should.
name: Jennifer Walters
text: "I Object!" — Interrupt: When threat would be placed on a scheme, prevent 1 of that threat. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Turn around gentlemen, and meet -- the Hellcat!"
name: Hellcat
text: Action: Return Hellcat to your hand.

flavor: "You messed with the wrong woman!" -- She-Hulk
name: Gamma Slam
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal X damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 15). X is the amount of damage you have sustained.

flavor: "These boots were made for stompin'." -- She-Hulk
name: Ground Stomp
text: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to each enemy.

flavor: "That's the first time I've ever seen someone argue their way out of a fight." -- Spider-Man
name: Legal Practice
text: Alter-Ego Action (thwart): Choose and discard up to 5 cards from your hand → remove 1 threat from a scheme for each card discarded this way.

flavor: "I just don't care for men with fresh mouths." -- Jennifer Walters
name: One-Two Punch
text: Response: After you make a basic attack (using your ATK), ready She-Hulk.

flavor: "I know a thing or two about rage. And that kind of fury... it's not going to pass without taking someone with it." -- Jennifer Walters
name: Split Personality
text: Action: Change your form (flip your identity card). Then, draw up to your printed hand size.

flavor: "I'll be sending you a bill. My time is valuable these days." -- Jennifer Walters
name: Superhuman Law Division
text: Alter-Ego Action (thwart): Exhaust Superhuman Law Division and spend a [mental] resource → remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Focused Rage
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Focused Rage and take 1 damage → draw 1 card.

name: Superhuman Strength
text: She-Hulk gets +2 ATK. Forced Response: After She-Hulk attacks, discard Superhuman Strength → stun the attacked enemy.

flavor: "I am Iron Man."
name: Iron Man
text: You get +1 hand size for each [[Tech]] upgrade you control (to a maximum hand size of 7).

flavor: "I'm obviously not doing this for the money..."
name: Tony Stark
text: Futurist — Action: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the others. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Is this a private war -- or can anyone join?"
name: War Machine
text: Action: Exhaust War Machine and deal 2 damage to him → deal 1 damage to each enemy.

name: Repulsor Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to an enemy and discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy] resource discarded this way, deal 2 additional damage to that enemy.

flavor: "Nice technique. But if you do it like this... it hurts more." -- Tony Stark
name: Supersonic Punch
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy (8 damage instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).

flavor: "Do your thing. I've got this."
name: Pepper Potts
text: Resource: Exhaust Pepper Potts → generate the resources of the top card in your discard pile.

flavor: "I was hoping for something a little bigger. But this will do." -- Tony Stark
name: Stark Tower
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Stark Tower → choose a player. That player returns the topmost [[Tech]] upgrade in their discard pile to their hand.

flavor: "When I put on this armor, I took on more power than any human was ever intended to have... and maybe more responsibility than my heart can truly bear." -- Tony Stark
name: Arc Reactor
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Arc Reactor → ready Iron Man.

flavor: "Is that all you've got!" -- Tony Stark
name: Mark V Armor
text: You get +6 hit points.

flavor: "Tony, are you sure you want to do that!" -- P.E.P.P.E.R.
name: Mark V Helmet
text: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Mark V Helmet → remove 1 threat from a scheme (from each scheme instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).

flavor: "Please, let me give you... a hand." -- Tony Stark
name: Powered Gauntlets
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Powered Gauntlets → deal 1 damage to an enemy (2 damage instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).

name: Rocket Boots
text: You get +1 hit point. Hero Action: Exhaust Rocket Boots and spend a [mental] resource → gain the [[Aerial]] trait until the end of the phase.

flavor: "To attack me is to attack Wakanda."
name: Black Panther
text: Retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

name: T'Challa
text: Foresight — Setup: Search your deck for a [[Black Panther]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "You would be lost without me, brother!"
name: Shuri
text: Response: After Shuri enters play, search your deck for an upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "In Wakanda, we draw strength from the knowledge of our ancestors." -- T'Challa
name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Alter-Ego Action: Choose up to 3 different cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

flavor: "Since the time of Bashenga, we've controlled our destiny as few other nations have."
name: Vibranium

flavor: Wakanda's capital city is an unrivaled architectural and technological marvel.
name: The Golden City
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust The Golden City → draw 2 cards.

name: Energy Daggers
text: Special: Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to the villain and to each enemy engaged with that player (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Panther Claws
text: Special (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy (4 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Tactical Genius
text: Special (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme (2 threat instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Vibranium Suit
text: Special (attack): Move 1 damage from your hero to an enemy (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Hulk
text: Forced Response: After Hulk attacks, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. [energy] - Deal 1 damage to each character. [mental] - Discard Hulk. [wild] - All of the above.

flavor: "Sorry -- no autographs."
name: Tigra
text: Response: After Tigra attacks and defeats a minion, heal 1 damage from her.

flavor: "Kamala, we don't have a theme song. Please stop humming one..." -- Captain Marvel
name: Chase Them Down
text: Response (thwart): After your hero attacks and defeats an enemy, remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Relentless Assault
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to a minion. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, this attack gains overkill. (Excess damage from this attack is dealt to the villain.)

flavor: SMACK!
name: Uppercut
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.

name: The Power of Aggression
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Aggression (red) card.

name: Tac Team
text: Uses (3 attack counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Action: Exhaust Tac Team and remove 1 attack counter from it → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Tony! She did it again!" -- Janet Van Dyne
name: Combat Training
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Your hero gets +1 ATK.

flavor: "Sometimes, I think I accomplish more with my fists than with my law firm."
name: Daredevil
text: Response: After Daredevil thwarts, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I am very good at finding people."
name: Jessica Jones
text: Jessica Jones gets +1 THW for each side scheme in play.

flavor: "You lose. And you're going to answer for what you've done." -- Captain America
name: For Justice!
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (4 threat instead if you paid for this card using a [mental] resource).

name: Great Responsibility
text: Hero Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, you take it as damage instead.

name: The Power of Justice
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Justice (yellow) card.

flavor: "Oh, she's sorry! Let me get the keys and call you a car service!" -- Misty Knight
name: Interrogation Room
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After you defeat a minion, exhaust Interrogation Room → remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Surveillance Team
text: Uses (3 snoop counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Action: Exhaust Surveillance Team and remove 1 snoop counter from it → remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Heroic Intuition
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Your hero gets +1 THW.

name: Hawkeye
text: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Response: After a minion enters play, remove 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye → deal 2 damage to that minion.

flavor: "Believe it or not, we all want the same thing."
name: Maria Hill
text: Response: After Maria Hill enters play, each player draws 1 card.

flavor: "I will handle this"
name: Vision
text: Action: Spend a [energy] resource → choose THW or ATK. Until the end of the phase, Vision gets +2 to the chosen power. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "We train hard every day so that when the time comes, we'll be ready" -- Steve Rogers
name: Get Ready
text: Action: Ready an ally.

flavor: "Let's go everyone!" -- Carol Danvers
name: Lead from the Front
text: Hero Action: Choose a player. Each character that player controls gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

flavor: "This is a code red! All hands on deck!" -- Maria Hill
name: Make the Call
text: Action: Pay the printed cost of an ally in any player's discard pile → put that ally into play under your control.

name: The Power of Leadership
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Leadership (blue) card.

flavor: "This they made it tall enough?" -- She-Hulk
name: The Triskelion
text: Increase your ally limit by 1. (This allows you to control more than 3 allies.)

flavor: "I'm glad she's on our side." -- Star-Lord
name: Inspired
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

name: Black Widow
text: Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, exhaust Black Widow and spend a [mental] resource → cancel the effects of that card and discard it. Then, reveal another card from the encounter deck.

flavor: "Power Man for hire -- Cage speakin'.
name: Luke Cage
text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

flavor: "That's what you get!" -- Iron Fist
name: Counter-Punch
text: Response (attack): After your hero defends against an enemy attack, deal damage to that enemy equal to your hero's ATK.

flavor: "Ahem! Stand aside, citizens!" -- Ms. Marvel
name: Get Behind Me!
text: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects. The villain attacks you instead.

name: The Power of Protection
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Protection (green) card.

name: Med Team
text: Uses (3 medical counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card.) Action: Exhaust Med Team and remove 1 medical counter from it → heal 2 damage from a friendly character.

flavor: Life-saving and stylish.
name: Armored Vest
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Your hero gets +1 DEF.

flavor: "We have no choice. So we fight -- and we win. There are no other options." -- Captain America
name: Indomitable
text: Response: After your hero defends, discard indomitable → ready your hero.

name: Mockingbird
text: Response: After Mockingbird enters play, stun an enemy.

name: Nick Fury
text: Forced Response: After Nick Fury enters play, choose one: remove 2 threat from a scheme, draw 3 cards, or deal 4 damage to an enemy. At the end of the round, if Nick Fury is still in play, discard him.

flavor: "CALLING ALL UNITS! CALLING ALL UNITS!"
name: Emergency
text: Interrupt (thwart): When the villain schemes, reduce the amount of threat placed on the scheme by 1.

flavor: "Does it still qualify as first aid if it's your second day in the hospital?" -- Clint Barton
name: First Aid
text: Action: Heal 2 damage from any character.

flavor: WHAM!
name: Haymaker
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Energy
text: Max 1 per deck.

name: Genius
text: Max 1 per deck..

name: Strength
text: Max 1 per deck..

flavor: "Did you remember to turn off the stove?" -- Janet Van Dyne
name: Avengers Mansion
text: Max 1 per player. Action: Exhaust Avengers Mansion → choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

flavor: "A flying aircraft carrier? You're kidding, right?" -- Jennifer Walters
name: Helicarrier
text: Max 1 per player. Action: Exhaust Helicarrier → choose a player. Reduce the resource cost of the next card that player plays this phase by 1.

name: Tenacity
text: Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and discard this card → ready your hero.
